name: Blue 1
defeatMessage: I heard the Pokémon League is crawling with tough Trainers. I have to figure out how to get past them. You should quit dawdling and get a move on!

name: Blue 2
defeatMessage: Hey! Take it easy! You won already!

name: Blue 3
defeatMessage: Humph! At least you're raising your Pokémon!

name: Blue 4
defeatMessage: What? You stinker! I took it easy on you, too!

name: Fighting Dojo
defeatMessage: That was a great battle. Here, have this Fighting Egg reward for conquering the Fighting Dojo!</br>If you put it in the hatchery and you are lucky you can get a rare Pokémon that you might not be able to find anywhere else in Kanto, or unlucky and get a common Pokémon.</br>But if you don't get what you need, don't worry, you can buy eggs need in Poké Marts.

name: Blue 5
defeatMessage: I'm moving on up and ahead! I'm going to the Pokémon League to boot out the Elite Four! I'll become the world's most powerful Trainer! Well, good luck to you! Don't sweat it! Smell ya!

name: Biker Goon 1
defeatMessage: Wha... What is this kid?!

name: Biker Goon 2
defeatMessage: Stop fooling around!

name: Cue Ball Paxton
defeatMessage: All right, enough! We'll leave like you wanted! We'll be happy to see the last of this boring island!

name: Ash Ketchum New Island
defeatMessage: I found this Clone Mewtwo left behind. Can you take care of it?

name: Bill's Grandpa
defeatMessage: Hahaha, that was one of the best battles I've ever had.

name: Blue 6
defeatMessage: That loosened me up. I'm ready for the Pokémon League! You need more practice! But hey, you know that! I'm out of here. Smell ya!

name: Santa Jynx 1
defeatMessage: Huh? They ran off and are trying to blend in with the local Pokémon population. Find those Santa Jynx and collect more Christmas presents!

name: Santa Jynx 2
defeatMessage: Huh? They ran off and are trying to blend in with the local Pokémon population. Find those Santa Jynx and collect more Christmas presents!

name: Santa Jynx 3
defeatMessage: Huh? They ran off and are trying to blend in with the local Pokémon population. Find those Santa Jynx and collect more Christmas presents!

name: Santa Jynx 4
defeatMessage: Huh? They ran off and are trying to blend in with the local Pokémon population. Find those Santa Jynx and collect more Christmas presents!

name: Silver 1
defeatMessage: ...Humph! Are you happy you won?

name: Silver 2
defeatMessage: ...Humph! Useless Pokémon! Listen, you. You only won because my Pokémon were weak.

name: Silver 3
defeatMessage: ...Humph! I'm not fighting with another weakling ever again. It's just too much playing around.

name: Silver 4
defeatMessage: ...Why... Why do I lose? I've assembled the toughest Pokémon. I haven't eased up on the gas. So why do I lose?

name: Silver 5
defeatMessage: .................. I haven't given up on becoming the greatest Trainer... I'm going to find out why I can't win and become stronger... When I do, I will challenge you. I'll beat you down with all my power. ...Humph! You keep at it until then.

name: Suicune 1
defeatMessage: Suicune fled.

name: Eusine
defeatMessage: I hate to admit it, but you win. You're amazing! I'm starting to understand why Suicune was keeping an eye on you. I'm going to keep searching for Suicune. I have a feeling we'll see each other again. See you around!

name: Suicune 2
defeatMessage: Suicune fled.

name: Suicune 3
defeatMessage: Suicune fled.

name: Suicune 4
defeatMessage: Suicune fled.

name: Suicune 5
defeatMessage: Suicune didn't flee.

name: Kimono Girls
defeatMessage: You have beautifully proven that the bond between people can be extended to the bond between people and Pokémon. We all appreciate that you have lived up to our expectations. This Clear Bell will signal to Ho-Oh that you are worthy of its attentions.

name: Spiky-eared Pichu
defeatMessage: The Spiky-eared Pichu ran into the forest!

name: Rocket Boss Giovanni
defeatMessage: What in the world are you? How this is possible...? How can a kid like you manage to destroy my dream once again? The precious dream of Team Rocket has become little more than an illusion...

name: Silver 6
defeatMessage: My training's still not good enough...? My Pokémon are so weak, it makes me frustrated... But I can feel that they are getting better after each battle.................. Tch! They're still too weak! I need to give them more training...

name: Silver 7
defeatMessage: ...Oh, no... I still can't win after all that training... I...I have to believe more in my Pokémon... ...No big deal. Sorry to have got in the way. Don't forget to rest your Pokémon before you challenge the Champion again!

name: Youngster Joey
defeatMessage: How?!? My Rattata is in the top percentage of all Rattata!

name: May 1
defeatMessage: Wow! That's great! You're pretty good!

name: May 2
defeatMessage: Yikes! You're better than I expected!

name: May 3
defeatMessage: Yikes! You're better than I expected!

name: May 4
defeatMessage: Achah! You're strong! I was worried that you might be struggling with your training.

name: May 5
defeatMessage: I remember the battle I had with you on Route 103. That battle helped you become this strong, didn't it?

name: Wally 2
defeatMessage: Wow! You are strong, after all! I couldn't beat you today, but one of these days, I'll catch up to you!

name: Clown Jessie & James
defeatMessage: We're blasting off again!!!!

name: Butler 1
defeatMessage: Butler managed to load Jirachi into a cage and escaped in his van. He is headed for the Jagged Pass!

name: Butler 2
defeatMessage: Butler throws the switch on a machine, causing the earth to quake. A huge, ominous shape begins to rise from the ground!

name: Meta Groudon
defeatMessage: Meta Groudon lets out a guttural roar and melts back into the earth!

name: Latias
defeatMessage: Latias joins your party, and Latios flies away back to the mainland.

name: Latios
defeatMessage: Latios joins your party, and Latias flies away back to the mainland.

name: Willie
defeatMessage: Whew! With skills like that, y'all should head to Phenac City.

name: Folly
defeatMessage: The shady guy flees, dropping a mysterious sack. The sack.... cries out in pain?

name: Cipher Peon Doven
defeatMessage: Rats! Foiled by some nobody!

name: Cipher Peon Silton
defeatMessage: Man! I was really having fun doing these crimes.

name: Cipher Peon Kass
defeatMessage: Run away!

name: Cipher Peon Naps
defeatMessage: What was that? My Shadow Pokémon! It doesn't matter though, my teammates escaped with Professor Krane!

name: Chobin 1
defeatMessage: Huh? Closer observation reveals that the subject is a trainer. Ergo, the subject is not a burglar! Ahaha! Chobin wishes you spoke up right away. You're $playername$? Chobin apologizes for jumping to the wrong conclusion.

name: Miror B. 1
defeatMessage: You messed up my rhythm! I just can't, no, I just can't do it! Shouldn't you be paying more attention to what's happening in the Pyrite Buiding than to me?

name: Chobin 2
defeatMessage: Huh? Oh, you're that trainer from before?! Chobin wishes you spoke up right away.

name: Cipher Peon Smarton
defeatMessage: You're too late! We already took everything we needed!

name: Zook
defeatMessage: Yeah, whatever! I was leaving anyways.

name: Miror B. 2
defeatMessage: I shouldn't have done something this strenuous right after eating… I'll need to get some new Shadow Pokémon from Team Snagem.

name: Sevii Rocket Grunt 1
defeatMessage: Huh, what? Why'd you have to win?

name: Sevii Rocket Grunt 2
defeatMessage: Develop amnesia conveniently and forget everything you heard!

name: Sevii Rocket Grunt 3
defeatMessage: Oh, but... Too much!

name: Sevii Rocket Grunt 4
defeatMessage: What do you think you're doing?!

name: Sevii Rocket Grunt 5
defeatMessage: Don't...you...dare...laugh...

name: Sevii Rocket Ariana
defeatMessage: You're doing things according to your beliefs and morals. I understand now...

name: Sevii Rocket Archer
defeatMessage: Urgh... You were too strong... ... Th-that's Giovanni's Badge! So it's true? Team Rocket really has disbanded? ...We will abandon this warehouse. But don't think this is over. I won't let this be the end. I will find Giovanni. And I will resurrect Team Rocket! I will... Until then, farewell!

name: Scientist Gideon
defeatMessage: If I can't sell the Sapphire, it's worthless! Go ahead, take it!

name: Pinkan Jessie & James
defeatMessage: We're blasting off again!!!!

name: Pinkan Officer Jenny
defeatMessage: So you're not with them? Okay... Just don't help those criminals in the future, got it? Looks like some new Pinkan Pokémon have made their way to the island, if you bring us some Pinkan Berries we'll trade you for them.

name: Barry 1
defeatMessage: What are you saying?! We ended up losing?!

name: Barry 2
defeatMessage: What just happened? I lost?!

name: Barry 3
defeatMessage: Waaah! It goes to show my surefire winning strategy doesn't work.

name: Barry 4
defeatMessage: Heh, yeah, maybe you did get a bit tougher since last time.

name: Galactic Boss Cyrus
defeatMessage: Impressive. Your prowess is notable.

name: Barry 5
defeatMessage: Yeah, yeah, you're just a bit better than me,.

name: Barry 6
defeatMessage: I guess I'm not ready for the Pokémon League if I'm losing to you! Darn it! You watch, though! I'll get tougher and win my way through the Pokémon League! Because I'm going to become the Champion, the toughest Trainer! You'd better not lose to anyone before me!

name: Barry 7
defeatMessage: ...! It's all right, though. Keep getting tougher. The more you do, the tougher my Pokémon and I get, too. There's no end to Pokémon. That's what I'm saying!

name: Manaphy Go-Rock MGrunt 1
defeatMessage: Your teamwork is too good!

name: Manaphy Go-Rock FGrunt 1
defeatMessage: Your battling skills are solid...

name: Manaphy Go-Rock MGrunt 2
defeatMessage: Darn it! You better remember this!

name: Manaphy Go-Rock MGrunt 3
defeatMessage: The Go-Rock Squad's future looks bleak...

name: Manaphy Go-Rock FGrunt 2
defeatMessage: Bleh to you!

name: Manaphy Go-Rock MGrunt 4
defeatMessage: Darn it! You better remember this! ...Wait, didn't I already say that...?

name: Manaphy Go-Rock Commander
defeatMessage: Owowow! Okay, okay, I got it! You can have your stupid egg!

name: Manaphy Go-Rock Pincher
defeatMessage: Argh! With that Manaphy Egg, I thought even an ex-Go-Rock like me could live out the rest of my life in ease! That Happiny took the egg to the south-east, across the water. I wanted to pursue it, but Carvanha are not... comfortable to ride on.

name: Manaphy Egg Protectors
defeatMessage: As you step over the defeated Pokémon, the Manaphy egg glows... and hatches!

name: Zero
defeatMessage: Argh! I can't believe I lost to someone like you! You can keep the key for now, but I'll get my revenge one day.

name: Hugh 1
defeatMessage: I couldn't achieve victory for my partner... I won't let myself forget this frustration!

name: Hugh 2
defeatMessage: It can't be! How could I have lost? I need to apologize to my partner...

name: Team Plasma Grunt 1
defeatMessage: Plasmaaaa! I lost! This is awful!

name: Colress 1
defeatMessage: Splendid! You are quite the Trainer!

name: Team Plasma Grunt 2
defeatMessage: Don't let it go to your head... But you put up a good fight, kid!

name: Team Plasma Grunt 3
defeatMessage: What's the big idea? This Pokémon I stole is useless!

name: Hugh 3
defeatMessage: Man! I lost... You've become way too tough! But, I'm gonna get stronger, too!

name: Cheren
defeatMessage: Fantastic! You and your Pokémon have grown much stronger!

name: Colress 2
defeatMessage: Well done! I learned much from this battle!

name: Team Plasma Grunt 4
defeatMessage: You! So you're a Trainer who fights while believing in your Pokémon, are you?

name: Team Plasma Grunt 5
defeatMessage: Plasmaaaa! Plasmaaaa!!

name: Team Plasma Grunts 1
defeatMessage: The Gym Leader is tough, but you... Are you even human?! I tried to use the same combination, and yet...

name: Team Plasma Grunts 2
defeatMessage: No! At this rate, I... I won't be able to protect the Plasma Frigate! P-P-P-Plasmaaaa!

name: Hugh 4
defeatMessage: I couldn't even draw out my team's real strength... How pathetic!

name: Team Plasma Grunt 6
defeatMessage: What a blunder to have made in front of Zinzolin...

name: Zinzolin 1
defeatMessage: You can't stop us! We will use the DNA Splicers to awaken the true power of the legendary Dragon-type Pokémon! We will steal the Splicers from the Opelucid City gym leader!

name: Team Plasma Grunt 7
defeatMessage: You little... You knocked out my stupid pawns!

name: Team Plasma Grunt 8
defeatMessage: Argh! Lame! Stupid! Fool! Plasmaaaa!

name: Team Plasma Grunt 9
defeatMessage: Even if I lose, I will not give up on justice for Team Plasma! That's all!

name: Zinzolin 2
defeatMessage: Have you gotten even stronger than you were in Lacunosa Town? How, in such a brief amount of time...

name: Plasma Shadow 1
defeatMessage: I hate to admit it, but... You're a good trainer. Awww. How unlucky. I don't happen to be the one holding the DNA Splicers. I was just buying time for the others to escape. Cheerio, bye-bye, whatever.

name: Colress 3
defeatMessage: So this is what it means to draw forth the power hidden in your Pokémon! To me, whether Team Plasma wins or whether you win will decide how the relationship between people and Pokémon should be! You'd better hurry, they have already captured the legendary Dragon-type Pokémon! Good luck in your battle!

name: Plasma Shadow 2
defeatMessage: It doesn't bother us a bit if the stolen Pokémon cry or beg.

name: Plasma Shadow 3
defeatMessage: It doesn't bother us a bit if we have to use another Pokémon after one is defeated.

name: Plasma Shadow 4
defeatMessage: It doesn't bother us a bit if Pokémon win or lose.

name: Ghetsis 1
defeatMessage: I can't believe it! The Black and White Kyurem I went to all the trouble of preparing! How irritating! Now I have to go recapture Kyurem, don't I? But first, I'll take down this disgusting Trainer with my own hand! This time I WILL succeed! No matter what they try, no one will be able to stop me!

name: Ghetsis 2
defeatMessage: My plans for complete and total world domination foiled yet again? No! It mustn't be! I couldn't have been defeated by some random Trainer from who knows where!

name: Destiny Deoxys Rayquaza
defeatMessage: Rayquaza and Deoxys fled seperate ways.

name: Destiny Deoxys Army
defeatMessage: The Deoxys are scattering.

name: Destiny Rayquaza
defeatMessage: Rayquaza calmed down.

name: Hugh 5
defeatMessage: ...Phew! You're really something! Thanks to you, I accomplished what I set out to do during my journey! I think you're really amazing! So become the Champion! Get the proof that you're a Trainer your Pokémon can be proud of! See you!

name: Hugh 6
defeatMessage: This bitter...yet refreshing feeling.

name: Hugh 7
defeatMessage: Just'd expected! You are really drawing forth your Pokémon's power!... I suppose that's it. If winning in battles is strength, then believing that your Pokémon will come back and waiting for its return is also strength. Doing what you think is right no matter what anyone else says, like these guys do, is strength, too.

name: Terrakion 1
defeatMessage: You're actually very strong. It's very possible that Cobalion trusted you to find us. Well then, where are we supposed to meet? The Moor of Icirrus? Very well, I shall make my way there, then. You should come, too. Cobalion should know where you might find our companion, Virizion.

name: Swords of Justice 1
defeatMessage: It seems you're pretty strong, $playername$. We'll let you help us since you were able to defeat us in a battle. Now, onto the plan. We'll start by searching for clues on where Kyurem might attack, so you'll start by looking around the Giant Chasm. Good luck in your endeavour, report back with your findings.

name: Dream Researcher
defeatMessage: Wow! You have proven that you have total power over the realm of dreams! The location of this Audinite was revealed to me in a dream, you deserve to have it!

name: Shauna 1
defeatMessage: Hey! I wasn't done watching my cute Li'l Pokémon yet!

name: Sycamore 1
defeatMessage: Ha ha! You're too much for me! You're really something, aren't you?

name: Tierno 1
defeatMessage: That was some nice footwork!

name: Trevor & Tierno
displayName: Pokémon Trainer Trevor & Pokémon Trainer Tierno
defeatMessage: So you can't learn everything just from the Pokédex... I see!

name: Team Flare Grunt 1
defeatMessage: You may have beaten me, but when I lose, I go out in style!

name: Team Flare Grunt 2
defeatMessage: You may have beaten me... again, but when I lose, I go out in style! But first hear this, pip-squeak! Team Flare is gonna use the stones on Route 10 and a fantastic treasure to make everyone on our team happy! In this world the ones who have power are the ones who win with flair!

name: Calem 1
defeatMessage: Your bonds with your Pokémon are really strong. Although, I don't like losing much...

name: Korrina
defeatMessage: What an incredible bond you have! What amazing power! You and Lucario are worthy of this Lucarionite!

name: Courtney 1
defeatMessage: Tedious...bothersome...child...You should...just be quiet...and give me...the Key Stone! Bah! I need a vacation somewhere warm.

name: Matt 1
defeatMessage: Hooaahhh! You clown! Always gettin' all up in my business! If it's gonna be like that, I'm outta here! The Southern Island's gotta be more fun than this.

name: Zinnia 1
defeatMessage: Niiice! Real nice! Ohhh, I really felt that one! Full points to you! That settles it! You get this Meteorite Shard reward!

name: Draconid Elder
defeatMessage: You are indeed powerful. I think you can help Zinnia.

name: Aqua Grunt
defeatMessage: Baaah! I gotta get out of here!

name: Magma Grunt
defeatMessage: The boss is gonna be so mad!

name: Courtney 2
defeatMessage: Why? Why must...you always...Always, always, always, always...Get in my way!

name: Matt 2
defeatMessage: Dang it! Am I not good enough, bro?!

name: Delta Wallace
defeatMessage: Zinnia has gone to the top of the Sky Pillar to try to summon Rayquaza. Please, try to help her. This Key Stone may help you.

name: Zinnia 2
defeatMessage: I thought... But I'm supposed to be the one who saves the world...

name: Deoxys
defeatMessage: The Meteor disintegrates into thousands of pieces.

name: Delta Giovanni
defeatMessage: Even here? Is there no getting rid of you? Take this and leave me alone.

name: Mr. Stone
defeatMessage: You're really strong! You should take this, it might come in handy with all this meteor business.

name: Shoal Fisherman
defeatMessage: I found this neat rock while hunting for shells! You want it?

name: Delta Brock
defeatMessage: Seems like you've gotten really strong since Kanto! I found this neat rock in the cave, you should keep it.

name: Delta Tabitha
defeatMessage: I guess you've earned this Cameruptite. Make sure your Camerupt holds on to it tightly.

name: Delta Shelly
defeatMessage: Fine you win. Take this Sharpedonite. Make sure your Sharpedo holds on to it tightly.

name: Icy Boulder
defeatMessage: The Glalie flees, dropping a stone.

name: Mega Draconid Elder
defeatMessage: You truly are a master of dragons. Please, take this stone.

name: Delta Steven
defeatMessage: I have to admit, you keep surprising me! You deserve to have this.

name: Dr Cozmo
defeatMessage: That was invigorating! Please take this!

name: Matt 3
defeatMessage: The Latias that Matt was harassing flies away, leaving a stone behind.

name: Courtney 3
defeatMessage: The Latios that Courtney was harassing flies away, leaving a stone behind.

name: Hoenn Stone Salesman
defeatMessage: Wow! I'll let you buy some of my super fancy stones, now that I know you're a serious trainer!

name: Kalos Stone Salesman
defeatMessage: Wow! I'll let you buy some of my super fancy stones, now that I know you're a serious trainer!

name: Captain Stern
defeatMessage: Well I'll be! You're quite the trainer!

name: Archie Primal
defeatMessage: You're too late, $playername$! I have uncovered the secrets of the Blue Orb, despite Maxie's meddling!

name: Maxie Primal
defeatMessage: You're too late, $playername$! I have uncovered the secrets of the Red Orb, despite Archie's meddling!

name: Primal Groudon
defeatMessage: Primal Groudon lets out a terrifying roar, then drops the Red Orb and returns to its normal form.

name: Primal Kyogre
defeatMessage: Primal Kyogre lets out a terrifying roar, then drops the Blue Orb and returns to its normal form.

name: Aipom Alley
defeatMessage: The Aipoms run off, dropping a small glass vial.

name: Mime Interview
defeatMessage: Mr. Mime relents and agrees to tell you what he knows.

name: Underground Fighting Ring
defeatMessage: OK, OK! I get my R from a guy at Clifford Industries, in Goldenrod City.

name: Lab Ambush
defeatMessage: As the dust clears from the battle, you see that Detective Pikachu has been wounded!

name: Imposter
defeatMessage: The Ditto loses its human form and collapses to the floor.

name: Possessed Mewtwo
defeatMessage: Howard's headset sparks and breaks. Mewtwo calms down, apparently free from Howard's influence. Mewtwo gives you a brief nod and flies off.

name: Riot
defeatMessage: Curse you! Diancie has escaped!

name: Merilyn
defeatMessage: You ruined my shopping spree!

name: Millis and Argus Steel
defeatMessage: Our plans are ruined! Retreat!

name: Rampaging Yveltal
defeatMessage: Diancie fights alongside you, Mega Evolving to land the final blow! She hands you her Mega Stone after the fight.

name: Hoopa 1
defeatMessage: The Unbound Hoopa casts you through a ring to a faraway land, escaping for now.

name: Hoopa 2
defeatMessage: The Unbound Hoopa casts you through a ring to a faraway land, escaping for now.

name: Hoopa 3
defeatMessage: The Unbound Hoopa casts you through a ring to a faraway land, escaping for now.

name: Hoopa 4
defeatMessage: The Unbound Hoopa casts you through a ring to a faraway land, escaping for now.

name: Hoopa 5
defeatMessage: The Unbound Hoopa casts you through a ring to a faraway land, escaping for now.

name: Hoopa 6
defeatMessage: The Unbound Hoopa is sucked into the Prison Bottle, and you gain control of it.

name: Calem 2
defeatMessage: Oof. I'd kind of forgotten how strong you are.

name: Calem 3
defeatMessage: Battling with you is fun, but losing all the time doesn't really make me look all that good.

name: Calem 4
defeatMessage: Why am I still playing catch-up to you?!

name: Team Flare Lysandre 1
defeatMessage: Excellent! I can feel the fire of your convictions burning deep within your heart! I tried to save people--and the world--with the profit from this lab. But my efforts had no effect... This world will eventually reach the point of no return... Saving the lives of all is impossible. Only the chosen ones will obtain a ticket to tomorrow. Do you want to have a ticket? Or, do you want to stop me? Show me in battle!

name: Team Flare Xerosic
defeatMessage: Oh ho ho! You're wonderful! Your Pokémon are amazing.

name: Xerneas
defeatMessage: You calmed down Xerneas and it ran away to the back of the lab.

name: Yveltal
defeatMessage: You calmed down Yveltal and it ran away to the back of the lab.

name: Team Flare Boss Lysandre 1
defeatMessage: It's over... Fools with no vision will continue to befoul this beautiful world. They will go on until the only thing left to do is squabble over the remaining scraps of hope...

name: Sycamore 2
defeatMessage: You are really something! You and your Pokémon have developed strong bonds by spending time together and by caring about one another. That's why you and your Pokémon are so strong.

name: Shauna 2
defeatMessage: Battles with friends are really, really exciting!

name: Tierno 2
defeatMessage: It's weird, but… I don't get that down when I lose to you.

name: Trevor
defeatMessage: There is still so much I don't know. Do I just not have what it takes?

name: Calem 5
defeatMessage: I'm still no match for you... You know, it's because I met you that I was able to get this far... But our journey's just getting started. Who knows what heights we'll reach!

name: AZ
defeatMessage: Thank you very much for battling with me. Now I finally feel free…

name: Ash Ketchum Kanto
defeatMessage: That was a fun battle!

name: Ash Ketchum Johto
defeatMessage: Don't I know you from somewhere?

name: Ash Ketchum Hoenn
defeatMessage: That was a nice rematch. You sure are a strong Pokémon trainer! I'll beat you next time!

name: Ash Ketchum Sinnoh
defeatMessage: Wow, these battles are intense. It's getting hard to keep up with you... I think I need a break.

name: Ash Ketchum Unova
defeatMessage: Hey, what gives? I was just trying to relax here!

name: Ash Ketchum Kalos
defeatMessage: I forgive you for chasing me around. I'm going to take some time off with a long vacation on a tropical island! Before I go, though, I'm gonna release Greninja. I think it's best for him to have experiences with other trainers. If you want to see if that could be you, he'll be roaming the region.

name: Ash Ketchum Pinkan
defeatMessage: Hey, you found me on my vacation! Did you see my Pikachu? Looks like it ate some of the berries here. Maybe you can find some other Pikachu like it hiding around here?

name: Calem 6
defeatMessage:
Here, this is for you!

That's right. It's Absolite. I found two of them. After everything we said to Lysandre, it just wouldn't be right if I didn't share one with you.

name: Twerps
defeatMessage: What do you mean "how is Pikachu floating?", all Pikachu can float! Because, uh... electromagnetism!

name: Marquis Grant
defeatMessage: To commemorate such an impressive show of teamwork, please accept this gift!

name: Grand Duchess Diantha
defeatMessage:
Witnessing the noble spirits of you and your Pokémon in battle has really touched my heart... Please, take this Gardevoirite.

I just... I just don't know what to say... I can hardly express this feeling...

name: Team Flare Boss Lysandre 2
defeatMessage: I see the strength to protect within you... Hopefully you can do a better job than me and protect a tomorrow that will be better than today. Take this Gyaradosite.

name: Hex Maniac Aster
defeatMessage: What’s this?! I see... Perhaps a Trainer can get the most out of this.

name: Wild Houndour Horde
defeatMessage:
With the leader of the pack defeated, the Houndour horde scatters, their fiery fury reduced to ashes. In the gleaming sunlight, you catch sight of a small gem left behind by their leader...

You obtained the Houndoominite!

requirements.hint: Capture a total of 500 or more Houndour.

name: Wild Electrike Horde
defeatMessage:
With the leader of the pack defeated, the Electrike horde scatters, their thunderous rage utterly depleted. In a thunderbolt's flash, you catch sight of a small gem left behind by their leader...

You obtained the Manectite!

requirements.hint: Capture a total of 500 or more Electrike.

name: Unrivaled Blue
defeatMessage: Aw man, what was I doing?

name: Unrivaled Green
defeatMessage: Come on! What's with that...?

name: Anomaly Mewtwo 1
defeatMessage: I see. You are indeed strong. But I do not wish to talk to you. As I already told you, do not continue to follow me.

name: Anomaly Mewtwo 2
defeatMessage: Do you not comprehend human speech?! Fine then, if you will not leave me alone, then I will not let you catch up to me!

name: Anomaly Mewtwo 3
defeatMessage: Damn it! How could you possibly pursue me so quickly!

name: Anomaly Mewtwo 4
defeatMessage: WHAT DO YOU WANT WITH ME, HUMAN?!

name: Anomaly Mewtwo 5
defeatMessage: GAARGH!!! ......... What? ......... You say you truly just want to help me? You are irritatingly persistant. Fine then. You say you know of a place where I can live undisturbed? Take me there.

name: Hau 1
defeatMessage:
Whoa! That was awesome! You and your Pokémon were both so cool!
Oh yeah! I'm Hau! You should totally check out Iki Town! We're holding a festival soon!

name: Hau 2
defeatMessage: Phew... That was awesome! That was a really great battle! I had a blast fighting you!

name: Skull 1
displayName: Team Skull Grunts A and B

name: Ilima
defeatMessage: You- or should I say you and your Pokémon- make quite the interesting team! I do hope you'll come to Verdant Cavern and attempt my trial!

name: Skull 2
displayName: Team Skull Grunts A and B
defeatMessage: Seriously, home slice?! You're too strong for a kid, yo! I've gotta go make someone else miserable to feel better! We're gonna go mess with Verdant Cavern!

name: Hau 3
defeatMessage: Aww, man! I wanted to show off my Pokémon's best side more!

name: Dexio
defeatMessage: That's what I would expect from a Trainer doing the island challenge. I felt the bond between you and your Pokémon!

name: Sina
defeatMessage: I get it... Facing trials helps you grow close to your team. I think that's absolutely wonderful!

name: Hau 4
defeatMessage: Nice! How'd you come up with that kind of battle plan? You gotta tell me!

name: Gladion 1
defeatMessage: Hmph... It's not like me to slip up like that. I've got to keep fighting stronger opponents. Looks like I'm still not ready...

name: Battle Royal
defeatMessage: The battle is over!

name: Plumeria 1
defeatMessage: Hmmph! You're pretty strong. I'll give you that. But mess with anyone in Team Skull again, and I'll show you how serious I can get.

name: Hau 5
defeatMessage: Bwah!! I had my breath held that whole battle!

name: Skull 4
defeatMessage: Yo, think about the bus drivers! If we take this bus stop, they can all chill!

name: Molayne
defeatMessage: Here's a little something to remember our meeting by! I gathered these Z-Crystals when I was on my own island challenge back in my own day. Take it, and use it well.

name: Psychium Z Trial
defeatMessage: Lucky you! There was a Z-Crystal hidden here all along! You obtained a Psychium Z!

name: Plumeria 2
defeatMessage: Hmmph. Guess you are pretty tough. Now I understand why my Grunts waste so much time battling kids. But if you want us to return the Pokémon, then you'll have to come to us. Alone. The boss is dying to meet you, hmmph! See you at our base in Po Town!

name: Gladion 2
defeatMessage: That was wrong of me... I shouldn't have dragged you into a meaningless battle like that...</br>But that Cosmog will bring disaster to all of Alola! I have to get it back from them! You're coming with me whether you like it or not. Get on the boat.

name: Exeggutor Tree
defeatMessage: Phew... That was an Exeggutor, wasn't it? This island is full of them! I think that they should all clear out once we get past them.

name: Recon Squad 3
defeatMessage: Perhaps it is time that we stop taking matters into our own hands and instead start relying on others. Must we start by putting our faith in you?

name: Necrozma
defeatMessage: Lusamine's interference summoned not one, but two Necrozma! That egotistical woman! You have driven one away and our Pokémon is safe, but the other is still in possession of that girl's "Nebby" and has taken on its true form!

name: Captain Mina
defeatMessage: Woah! I'm shocked at your strength! But you've only just begun my real trial. Now you have to go around to all the captains in Alola!

name: Captain Ilima
defeatMessage: Yes! You have emerged victorious! You and your Pokémon have become quite a delightful team! Off to Lush Jungle? It's been a while since I last visited Akala.

name: Captain Mallow
defeatMessage: Sure enough, when it comes to you and Pokémon, the quality of the ingredients shines forth! Once you defeat Lana do you want to go to Wela Volcano Park with two pretty pals like us?

name: Captain Lana
defeatMessage: Well! Once again, you certainly reeled me in. Please have a good time with Kiawe.

name: Captain Kiawe
defeatMessage: Not enough dancing! If you're hoping to complete Mina's trial, you should make for Hokulani Observatory next. Ula'Ula is only a stone's throw away when Charizard is one of your Ride Pokémon!

name: Captain Sophocles
defeatMessage: I couldn't get it done. Don't worry about it, my precious Pokémon... You've gotta finish Mina's trial, right? Are you going to Aether House?

name: Kahuna Nanu
defeatMessage: Heh... You got me good, kid. Hope I don't get in trouble with the girl for this. You should go tell that young filly Mina that you're done with what she asked you to do.

name: Gladion 3
defeatMessage: You've got good Pokémon. I know what kind of Trainer you are now. And what kind of journey you've been through.</br>Lillie's looking after our mother at the foundation. Hau's working hard to get stronger, too...</br>I know we aren't friends. But we aren't enemies anymore either. Keep winning. Maybe I'll see you again if you do.

name: Lillie

requirement.hint: Must have played the Sun Flute during Emissary of Light quest line
Must have played the Moon Flute during Emissary of Light quest line

defeatMessage: Nebby, you want to keep on traveling together with $playername$, don't you? Of course I can tell how you feel! After all...we're family now, aren't we?</br>$playername$! Nebby doesn't want this journey with you to end. And I want you to grant it this wish! Share the world with Nebby!

name: Guzma Bug Memory
defeatMessage:
That was a good beat-down, Champion! You sure wrecked me again. This just proves how much of a tough trainer you are. Here is the Memory you've been looking for.

You obtained a Bug Silvally Memory!

name: Kahili Flying Memory
defeatMessage:
You're pretty talented, $playername$! No wonder you've become the Champion of Alola! Anyways, here is the Memory. I said I'd give it to you.

You obtained a Flying Silvally Memory!

name: Plumeria Poison Memory
defeatMessage:
You're pretty strong, $playername$. Maybe my Pokémon and I need to go through more together to deepen our friendship. Take the Memory with you, you deserve it.

You obtained a Poison Silvally Memory!

name: Acerola Ghost Memory
defeatMessage:
That was so much fun, $playername$! I hope you come by more times so we can battle more often! Anyways, here is the Memory Mimikyu had found.

You obtained a Ghost Silvally Memory!

name: Faba Psychic Memory
defeatMessage:
You're still pretty strong after all that time since our last battle. Well, take this Memory. Now off with you!

You obtained a Psychic Silvally Memory!

name: Molayne Steel Memory
defeatMessage:
That was a good match! Thank you for helping me train in here and reward for being the first person to defeat me, you can take this strange disk!

You obtained a Steel Silvally Memory!

name: Ryuki Dragon Memory
defeatMessage:
And the crowd goes wild! $playername$! You should come by my Gym someday! It's in Malie city on Ula'ula Island right above the Poké Mart, can't miss it. What? You've never seen it? It's totally there and a real thing! Anyways you can take this.. What was it's name? Oh, right. You can take this Memory with you.

You obtained a Dragon Silvally Memory!

name: Anabel
defeatMessage: Oh you're good! You might just have a shot, here are some Beast Balls. Go hunt down those strange Ultra Beasts! If you need more Beast Balls, you can buy them here.

name: Captain Mina UB
defeatMessage: Your strength is still shocking!

name: Kahuna Nanu UB
defeatMessage: I had to be sure. Sure that you're ready for what's coming...

name: Ash Ketchum Alola
defeatMessage: Thanks for battling with me again! I've reignited my passion to battle after a nice, long break! ....Did one of the Pikachu here steal my Pikachu's hat? Oh well. I have spares. It'll be somewhere around here if you want it.

name: Rainbow Rocket Grunt 1
defeatMessage: Hmph! I'll have you know defeating me won't do you any good, anyway.

name: Rainbow Rocket Grunt 2
defeatMessage: Hmph! I'll have you know defeating me won't do you any good, anyway.

name: Aether Branch Chief Faba
defeatMessage: Hmph! I'll have you know defeating me won't do you any good, anyway.

name: Team Aqua Leader Archie
defeatMessage: You've made your point. I can see you are not one to be trifled with.

name: Team Magma Leader Maxie
defeatMessage: I fell behind, but only by an inch.

name: Team Galactic Leader Cyrus
defeatMessage: Impressive. Your prowess is notable.

name: Team Flare Leader Lysandre
defeatMessage: I can feel the fire of your convictions burning deep within your heart!

name: Team Plasma Leader Ghetsis
defeatMessage: I couldn't have been defeated by some random Trainer from who knows where!

name: Team Rainbow Leader Giovanni
defeatMessage: Ha! That was a truly intense fight!

name: Magikarp Jump Koylee
defeatMessage: Your scales are full of heart!

name: Magikarp Jump Karpella
defeatMessage: Wow, you're the cream of the 'karp, alright!

name: Magikarp Jump Karpen
defeatMessage: Are you sure your Karp isn't flying-type?

name: Magikarp Jump Tykarp
defeatMessage: I lost because of my karpal tunnel...

name: Magikarp Jump Karpress
defeatMessage: Basculin the glory while you can, I'll get you next time! Wahaa!

name: Magikarp Jump Karami
defeatMessage: Well, it's oh-fish-ial! You win!

name: Magikarp Jump Karson
defeatMessage: Hey, would you mind letting minnow when you want to rematch?

name: Magikarp Jump Karpress 2
defeatMessage: I'm fin-ished...

name: Magikarp Jump Karpen 2
defeatMessage: Magikarp is so classy, it's so-fish-ticated

name: Magikarp Jump Karbuck
defeatMessage: That battle scared the karp out of me!

name: Magikarp Jump Skyhopper
defeatMessage: I will jump away from this battle!

name: Magikarp Jump Karpen 3
defeatMessage: Are you trying to fly to the stratosphere?

name: Magikarp Jump Karpella 2
defeatMessage: I hate fish puns...

name: Magikarp Jump Karbuck 2
defeatMessage: I wish a Pidgeotto would steal me away about now...

name: Magikarp Jump Kareign
defeatMessage: Wow, you've been drinking your Training Sodas!

name: Magikarp Jump Koylee 2
defeatMessage: I need to find more sunken treasures...

name: Magikarp Jump Karpress 3
defeatMessage: You cheater! I have seen Rowlet giving you money!!!

name: Magikarp Jump Karpen 4
defeatMessage: My Magikarp might not jump high but it's fast enough to win the Naskarp Cup.

name: Magikarp Jump Karpella 3
defeatMessage: I will beat you next time! Any fin is possible if you believe in it!

name: Magikarp Jump Skyhopper 2
defeatMessage: Who wants to place a bait on a rematch?

name: Magikarp Jump Tykarp 2
defeatMessage: The way my Magikarp performed is a-trout-cious!

name: Hop 1
defeatMessage: Well, that was a shock! Guess I know now why Lee thought he should give you a Pokémon, too...

name: Mirages
defeatMessage: The Pokémon fled.

name: Hop 2
defeatMessage: And I even got my Pokéball throw perfect too!

name: Hop 3
defeatMessage: Was that really good training? Looks like I'd better keep my guard up!

name: Bede 1
defeatMessage: I see... Well, that's fine. I wasn't really trying all that hard anyway.

name: Hop 4
defeatMessage: We both got ourselves the same Grass Badge, so how come you're so much stronger?

name: Bede 2
defeatMessage: You showed at least a little effort, so I decided I should let you win!

name: Marnie 1
defeatMessage: You beat me... Guess you must not be so bad after all, huh?

name: Hop 5
defeatMessage: My strategy goes right to pot when I've got all these bad thoughts running through my head...

name: Bede 3
defeatMessage: This has to be some kind of mistake. I demand a do-over!

name: Hop 6
defeatMessage: This is rubbish... My team can't perform if I can't get my own head straight Trainer...

name: Hop 7
defeatMessage: I still can't even beat you, my true rival... But I think I'm starting to see the light!

name: Marnie 2
defeatMessage: What's with that?! My Pokémon didn't get a chance to really do their thing at all. Ugh!

name: Eternatus
defeatMessage: You defeated Eternatus, but it looks like it's not over yet!

name: The Darkest Day
defeatMessage: You finally defeated Eternatus!

name: Hop 8
defeatMessage: I didn't expect there to be such a gap between you and me, mate...

name: Sordward 1
defeatMessage: Oh... How can this be? My...my Pokémon...

name: Shielbert 1
defeatMessage: Oh... How can this be? My...my Pokémon...

name: Rampaging Tsareena
defeatMessage: The Rampaging Tsareena fainted.

name: Rampaging Gyarados
defeatMessage: The Rampaging Gyarados fainted.

name: Rampaging Torkoal
defeatMessage: The Rampaging Torkoal fainted.

name: Sordward & Shielbert
defeatMessage: Quite the vexing predicament indeed, surely this must be some kind of mistake...

name: Rampaging Conkeldurr
defeatMessage: The Rampaging Conkeldurr fainted.

name: Rampaging Dusknoir
defeatMessage: The Rampaging Dusknoir fainted.

name: Gym Leader Bede
defeatMessage: Thank you for the battle. I can now accept you Champion. It's painful to admit, but I've come to realise a few of my weaknesses. But I'll keep getting stronger. I'll reach the pinnacle of what Fairy types can do.

name: Rampaging Gigalith
defeatMessage: The Rampaging Gigalith fainted.

name: Rampaging Froslass
defeatMessage: The Rampaging Froslass fainted.

name: Gym Leader Marnie
defeatMessage: Yeah I lost, but I'm gonna learn from your battle style and everythin'!

name: Rampaging Haxorus
defeatMessage: The Rampaging Haxorus fainted.

name: Sordward 2
defeatMessage: Oho... My noble Pokémon...

name: Shielbert 2
defeatMessage: Oho... My noble Pokémon...

name: Rampaging Zacian
defeatMessage: Zacian fainted.

name: Rampaging Zamazenta
defeatMessage: Zamazenta fainted.

name: Klara 1
defeatMessage: Oh, my next Pokémon's gonna make short work-- Huh? That was my last one?

name: Avery 1
defeatMessage: Such strength! I'm in Psyshock!

name: Mustard
defeatMessage: That was everything I hoped for and more!

name: Klara 2
defeatMessage: Just what have you got that I don't?

name: Avery 2
defeatMessage: What a Psystrike to my poor pride...

name: Klara 3
defeatMessage: But I didn't hold back! I gave it everything I've got...

name: Avery 3
defeatMessage: Oh, I should just Imprison myself for this!

name: Zarude Tribe 1
defeatMessage: Za! Za! Zarude!

name: Zarude Tribe 2
defeatMessage: Za! Za! Zarude!

name: Zarude Tribe 3
defeatMessage: Za! Za! Zarude!

name: Ash Ketchum Galar
defeatMessage: ...I really thought I could beat you this time. Still, it was a really fun battle! Okay, let's go to Glimwood Tangle! I'll beat you there!

name: Zarude (Dada)
defeatMessage: Zaru Zaruza. Zarude!

name: Flowering Celebi
defeatMessage: Cel Cel! Celebi!

name: Peony
defeatMessage: Gahahaaa! Look at me, takin' a thrashin' from a youngster like you!

name: Calyrex
defeatMessage: Cracrown crow. Roooooowwwn rown crown.

name: Glastrier
defeatMessage: The Pokémon ran away!

name: Spectrier
defeatMessage: The Pokémon ran away!

name: Dyna Tree Birds
defeatMessage: The legendary birds fled in different directions.

requirements.questLine: The Birds of the Dyna Tree

name: Galarian Articuno 1
defeatMessage: Galarian Articuno fled to elsewhere in the Crown Tundra.

requirements.questLine: The Birds of the Dyna Tree

visibleRequirement.questLine: The Birds of the Dyna Tree

name: Galarian Articuno 2
defeatMessage: Galarian Articuno fled to elsewhere in the Crown Tundra.

name: Galarian Articuno 3
defeatMessage: Galarian Articuno fled to elsewhere in the Crown Tundra.

name: Galarian Zapdos 1
defeatMessage: Galarian Zapdos fled to elsewhere in the Wild Area.

requirements.questLine: The Birds of the Dyna Tree

name: Galarian Zapdos 2
defeatMessage: Galarian Zapdos fled to elsewhere in the Wild Area.

name: Galarian Zapdos 3
defeatMessage: Galarian Zapdos fled to elsewhere in the Wild Area.

name: Galarian Moltres 1
defeatMessage: Galarian Moltres fled to elsewhere in the Isle of Armor.

requirements.questLine: The Birds of the Dyna Tree

visibleRequirement.questLine: The Birds of the Dyna Tree

name: Galarian Moltres 2
defeatMessage: Galarian Moltres fled to elsewhere in the Isle of Armor.

name: Galarian Moltres 3
defeatMessage: Galarian Moltres fled to elsewhere in the Isle of Armor.

name: Regigigas
defeatMessage: The ancient giant was defeated!

name: Eternamax Eternatus
defeatMessage: Defeated again, Eternatus fled far to the south!

name: Volo 1
defeatMessage: Moves, items... Use them well, and the world will open up to you!

name: Akari 1
defeatMessage: You and your Pokémon seem completely in step with one another.

name: Warden Mai
defeatMessage: You really aren't one of the usual Galaxy buffoons if you could defeat my partner... Well fought, Munchlax.

name: Alpha Kricketune
defeatMessage: You defeated Kricketune!

name: Warden Lian
defeatMessage: H-how can this be...

name: Irida 1
defeatMessage: I see now... Poké Balls are simply your tool of choice, not products of disregard for Pokémon. You still understand the Pokémon and trust them. I feel better putting my trust in you now, I think.

name: Lord of the Woods: Kleavor
defeatMessage: The golden light was dispelled from Kleavor, calming it.

name: Akari 2
defeatMessage: Oops! I keep finding myself caught up in observing the way the Pokémon use their moves...

name: Volo 2
defeatMessage: Oh, my! You're quite adept at instructing your Pokémon in battle! My goodness, that was fun!

name: Coin 1
defeatMessage: I'm not fond of this outcome, but at least it's still better than plowing fields for the Galaxy Team!

name: Ursaluna
defeatMessage: You defeated Ursaluna!

name: Lady of the Ridge: Lilligant
defeatMessage: The golden light was dispelled from Lilligant, calming it.

name: Irida 2
defeatMessage: Ah, now I feel better! The world is vast...and I am small within it.

name: Clover
defeatMessage: I don't get it! How'd I lose?!

name: Coin 2
defeatMessage: What a blithering mooncalf I am. How could I let myself lose...

name: Charm 1
defeatMessage: What a disgrace...

name: Lord of the Isles: Arcanine
defeatMessage: The golden light was dispelled from Arcanine, calming it.

name: Adaman 1
defeatMessage: You see how good they are now, yes? No more sneering at them!

name: Melli 1
defeatMessage: Listen here! Neither I nor Skuntank admit defeat to you just yet-our challenge to you still stands!

name: Warden Ingo
defeatMessage: Bravo! Excellent! Your talent has brought you to the destination called Victory! Now, allow me to call Sneasler...

name: Melli 2
defeatMessage: Let's make one thing clear: I didn't lose! You may have won...but there's a difference!

name: Lord of the Hollow: Electrode
defeatMessage: The golden light was dispelled from Electrode, calming it.

name: Warden Gaeric
defeatMessage: Outstanding! I'm tough iceberg, but you smashed me through and through!

name: Warden Sabi
defeatMessage: Wow, you caught us AND you beat us. You've won all our games so far! But Braviary still wants to get to know you even better. Up to the roof we go! All right, Braviary! Why not test out their strength for yourself?

name: Hisuian Braviary
defeatMessage: You defeated Braviary!

name: Lord of the Tundra: Avalugg
defeatMessage: The golden light was dispelled from Avalugg, calming it.

name: Beni
defeatMessage: It seems my ninja techniques will soon be consigned to history...

name: Charm 2
defeatMessage: Well, you are rather formidable...

name: Dialga (Origin)
defeatMessage: Dialga was captured in the Origin Ball and returned to its base form!

name: Palkia (Origin)
defeatMessage: Palkia was captured in the Origin Ball and returned to its base form!

name: The Galaxy Team's Kamado
defeatMessage: Even frightful creatures like Pokémon can become powerful allies...

name: Adaman 2
defeatMessage: You're really something...and I'm a man of my word. So, here's that treasure.

name: Irida 3
defeatMessage: I wonder... Are there people even stronger than you out in the world, with Pokémon stronger than yours? I'll just have to find out for myself I suppose! Here! The treasure I promised you.

name: Volo 3
defeatMessage: Turning tail and running? From this puny HUMAN? Pathetic! I was the one to feed you the power you needed so that you could take on Arceus! I was the one who gave you the chance to claw open that space-time rift, driving the deity of space and time mad so that you could drag the creator out from hiding!

name: Enamorus 3
defeatMessage: Before you could attempt to capture it, Enamorus fled to roam the region!

name: Arceus
defeatMessage: Arceus granted you a part of its self, and the Legend Plate!

name: Paradise Protection Protocol
defeatMessage: The Guardians of Paradise were defeated!
